reviews.review: Absolutely well-deserved sequel, fantastic story, tons of fun in co-op. Everything you loved in portal plus now custom map-making and now it's on sale for 99 cents? Stop reading this and go play this game.

KOZAK

Portal 2 is one of those games you can beat, and start over almost instantly. The first portal made us all think outside the box and it was good but portal 2 takes you so far out of the box, well, you're on the moon. The characters (although there are only a handful of them) are so entertaining, charming, and funny I never get tired of listening to them. The puzzles are challenging at times but rewarding as hell when you beat them. And if you do get tired of the main game? The workshop is constantly buzzing with user submitted test chambers to boggle your mind, I mean it's insane how cool so many of these are. Buy this game, I promise you won't regret it :)

For a game that's 8 years old, Portal 2 still holds up very well.
Graphics have aged somewhat but the gameplay more than makes up for it. There's something about zipping trough portals that makes you forget about the bad stuff in life.
The humour in this game is amazing. The characters really feel alive, even though they are robots.

10/10 game, contestor for my favorite game of all time.

(yes, I totally wrote this review for a badge, but this game is still amazing)

Fantastic game! 

The Portal franchise is really fun, it’s a great way to rattle your brain a little as you try to figure out levels.
The story is really cool and it leaves you wanting more, it can get a little boring after a bit but it’s worth it.
Hopefully they make a Portal 3 as the graphics could be really good with today’s technology.(make it happen)

The 2 player co-op is great to play but it’s definitely not as good as the story.
Personally Portal 2 is better than Portal but I recommend getting both anyways.

If you enjoy both of those than try getting the fan made story’s as they are really good as well!

Definitely play this game for the story!

Un juego que a pesar de los años sigue siendo de los mejores que he jugado de rompecabezas, es demasiado entretenido y con la variedad de mapas que hay en la Workshop y el modo cooperativo lo hace todavía divertido después de 10 años de que haya salido, En definitiva un juego que recomendaría sin dudarlo en las próximas generaciones.

old and gold

说实话，不愧是V社
传送门在前10%看起来像给小学生玩的闯关游戏，或者说一款使玩家体验飞行员晕机效果的模拟器，但是直到主角开始逃跑的那一刹那，整个游戏就瞬间颠覆了我的想法
这是一部关于两个人工智能互相掐架夺王位的故事，但是伴随着V社特有的阴暗感以及小幽默，这就是一道不错的下酒小菜，而它也可以作为一道量少但是够吃的主菜，回味十足，至少我觉得这是9分作无疑
